title: What is Coding with Caoimhe?
blog_text: Coding with Caoimhe is a blog which provides a space to develpers of all skill level to pass on any nuggests of gold they have found while coding.

title: Did you know? - VS Code Tips
blog_text: Everytime I use VS Code, I come across a new feature that makes me fall in love with it all over again! This week I was shown the shortcode cmd/ctrl + shift + f. This allows you to search within all the files in the current VS Code window. So next time you discover you have spelt categories with a second a, you can hunt that pesky letter with just a couple of key strokes!)

title: What is Insomnia?
blog_text: No, I am not planning on explaining why you are so tired - the late night coffee and coding sessions are to blame for that. What I want to tell you about is an app created by Kong. According to their website, Insomnia is a collaborative open source API developement platform. But what does that mean?
